full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## RISO Building Materials Request for Submission (RFSO)
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence has a request for the provision of building materials to 5th Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick.

### Tender Information
* Solicitation Number: W2037-230021/A
* Publication Date: 2022-09-12
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-09-27T13:00:00
* Amendment Number: 1
* Expected Contract Start Date: 1 October 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: 30 September 2024

### Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Trade Agreements: CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, CFTA, FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and UK
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Standing Offer(s) Number: Up to three (3)

### Delivery and Payment Information
* Main Delivery Point: 5 CDSB Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick
* Delivered points outside 5 CDSB Gagetown will be subject to prices at Annex "B" and may incur additional delivery charges.

### Documents
* RISO Building Materials Document available in English and French: [vievv the attachments on Buyandsell.gc.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/12/a8915853e6f926f17e071d31b3be8bc7/annex_b_w2037-230021_rfso_building_materials_bilingual.xlsx)
* Other attachments available on Buyandsell.gc.ca

### Supplier Requirements
* Suppliers must be in compliance with Trade Agreements listed above
* Documents may be presented in English or French

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Andrew MacFarlane
* Contact Email: andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (782) 377-4248
* Contact Fax: (506) 851-6759

### Terms and Conditions
* The clauses and conditions of this procurement are incorporated by reference into the contract documents.
* Amendments, when issued, will be available on Buyandsell.gc.ca. Suppliers must
